specific_question: What is the average EV battery lifespan of our current fleet as of Q3 2025?
answer: Our current fleet's average EV battery lifespan is 6.8 years as of Q3 2025.
justification: Understanding the current EV battery lifespan is crucial to determining the potential impact of AI-enhanced battery management on extending battery life.
dr_question: Can we leverage AI-enhanced battery management to improve EV battery lifespan by 15%?
